heading: This website wears a digital Red Ribbon.
info: It fights for the end of AIDS.

microsite.headline: digital Red Ribbon
microsite.text: I support the global, digital movement to see the end of AIDS. Together we can do it! Let’s build an AIDS free generation.
microsite.tweet: Lets work together to see an #AIDS free generation @dotHIV – static.clickcounter.hiv

name: ribbon
